item.title: Java
item.description: ICS3UO Notes Switch cases once condition met keep going until a break statement is met example: 1 2 3 4 5 6 case 8: print(); // break; case 9: print(); break; This will print twice as the break in case 8 is commented out and it keeps going until it hits a break

item.title: Selection Structures
VIM
item.description: Keybinds Beginner Keybinds J - Move up K - Move Down H - Move Left
